translations.text: By the fig and the olive ˹of Jerusalem˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: and this secure city ˹of Mecca˺!<sup foot_note=77628>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

verses.text_uthmani: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ

translations.text: Indeed, We created humans in the best form.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: But We will reduce them to the lowest of the low ˹in Hell˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ

translations.text: except those who believe and do good—they will have a never-ending reward.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa allatheena amanoowaAAamiloo assalihati falahum ajrun ghayrumamnoon
Now, what makes you deny the ˹final˺ Judgment?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Is Allah not the most just of all judges?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
